body:
So I recently combined a resource pack, didn't edit any of the files, I then logged in and grass and leaves had all turned grey. I checked the files and they had greyscale images, I then deleted the blocks so it returned to default but it was still grey.

help pls
body_tagged:
So I recently combined a resource pack, didn't edit any of the files, I then logged in and grass and leaves had all turned grey. I checked the files and they had greyscale images, I then deleted the blocks so it returned to default but it was still grey.

help pls
title: Grey nature?!?!  (RP help)

replies.body:
Probably an issue with the colormaps, haven't made a pack for a while so I'm not sure but...

Find the colormap and replace it with one from another resource pack.
replies.body_tagged:
Probably an issue with the colormaps, haven't made a pack for a while so I'm not sure but...

Find the colormap and replace it with one from another resource pack.

replies.body: By the way, the grass / nature textures are meant to be grey so the color can change in different biomes. Don't delete them.
replies.body_tagged: By the way, the grass / nature textures are meant to be grey so the color can change in different biomes. Don't delete them.

replies.body: Ok, I was gonna re-add them anyways because default was broken too. Thanks btw :D
replies.body_tagged: Ok, I was gonna re-add them anyways because default was broken too. Thanks btw :D

reply_to.body: By the way, the grass / nature textures are meant to be grey so the color can change in different biomes. Don't delete them.
